author: gstein
msg: Generate and install the serf-1.pc file.
* serfmake:
(MAJOR): new symbol to clarify what depends on the MAJOR version
(PCFILE): new symbol naming the .pc file
(cmd_build): also build the .pc file
(cmd_clean): clean out the generated .pc file
(Builder.__init__): save .prefix and .pkgconfigdir
(Builder.load_vars): split out the SSL libraries into .SSL_LIBS
(Builder.load_deps): combine the .LIBS and .SSL_LIBS for the complete
list of libraries to link executables against. add a dependency for
the .pc file generation
(Builder._add_dep): wrap simple strings into the new CommandLine
callable helper.
(Builder._write_pcfile): new method to generate the .pc file
(Builder.build_target): tuple-expand the DEP localvar for clarity.
assume that CMD is now a callable, and its docstring describes what is
going on.
(Builder.install_target): add creation of PKGCONFIGDIR. print out each
target as we install it. install the .pc file.
(class CommandLine): new helper for invoking system commands
(get_version): new helper to fetch a dotted version string

msg: * CHANGES: Yank Nagle line as it is noted in 0.7.2 section.
